Module com.simulator.hospital
Package com.simulator.hospital.model.logic

Class SimulatorModel

java.lang.Object
com.simulator.hospital.model.logic.SimulatorModel
public class SimulatorModel extends Object
Models a hospital simulation where customers are processed through multiple service points sequentially. The simulation tracks customer arrivals, service times, and departures while providing detailed metrics like utilization and average waiting times.

  • Field Summary

    eventList

  • Field Details

    • eventList

      protected EventList eventList
      The event list to manage and process simulation events.

  • Constructor Details

    • SimulatorModel

      public SimulatorModel(int numberRegister, double avgServiceTime1, int numberGeneral, double avgServiceTime2, int numberSpecialist, double avgServiceTime3, double avgArrivalTime)
      Constructs a new simulation model with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      numberRegister - Number of service points in the registration unit.
      avgServiceTime1 - Average service time for the registration unit.
      numberGeneral - Number of service points in the general unit.
      avgServiceTime2 - Average service time for the general unit.
      numberSpecialist - Number of service points in the specialist unit.
      avgServiceTime3 - Average service time for the specialist unit.
      avgArrivalTime - Average arrival time for customers.

  • Method Details

    • setSimulationTime

      public void setSimulationTime(double time)
      Sets the simulation runtime.
      Parameters:
      time - The total simulation time in seconds.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the simulation by scheduling the first customer arrival.

    • currentTime

      public double currentTime()
      Gets the time of the next scheduled event.
      Returns:
      The time of the next event in the event list.

    • simulate

      public boolean simulate()
      Checks if the simulation should continue running.
      Returns:
      true if the current clock time is less than the simulation time; otherwise false.

    • processEvent

      public Event processEvent()
      Processes the next event in the event list.
      Returns:
      The event that was processed.

    • getServiceUnits

      public ServiceUnit[] getServiceUnits()
      Gets the array of service units in the simulation.
      Returns:
      An array of service units.

    • runEvent

      public AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Customer,ServiceUnit> runEvent(Event t)
      Processes a B-phase event, such as customer arrivals and departures.
      Parameters:
      t - The event to process.
      Returns:
      A key-value pair where the key is the customer and the value is the service unit.

    • runBEvents

      public void runBEvents()
      Processes all B-phase events scheduled for the current time.

    • tryCEvents

      public HashMap<Customer,ServicePoint> tryCEvents()
      Processes C-phase events, starting service for customers if conditions are met.
      Returns:
      A map where the keys are customers and the values are their service points.

    • results

      public void results()
      Outputs the simulation results, including utilization and average waiting times.

    • getAvgWaitingTime

      public double getAvgWaitingTime()
      Gets the average waiting time of customers in the simulation.
      Returns:
      The average waiting time.

    • getCustomerCount

      public List<Integer> getCustomerCount()
      Gets the total number of customers served by each service point.
      Returns:
      A list of customer counts for each service point.

    • getUtilization

      public List<Double> getUtilization()
      Gets the utilization percentages of each service point.
      Returns:
      A list of utilization percentages for each service point.

    • getClock

      public Clock getClock()
      Gets the clock instance used in the simulation.
      Returns:
      The clock instance.
